# continueSpeaking()

**Instance Method**

Resumes speech from its paused point.

## Declaration

```swift
func continueSpeaking() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if speech resumes; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Discussion

This method only has an effect if the speech synthesizer is in a paused state.

## Controlling speech

- **speak(_:)**: Adds the utterance you specify to the speech synthesizer’s queue.
- **pauseSpeaking(at:)**: Pauses speech at the boundary you specify.
- **stopSpeaking(at:)**: Stops speech at the boundary you specify.
- **AVSpeechBoundary**: Specifies when to pause or stop speech.
